data.title: GameSpy: Gammick Entertainment
data.meta_description: Gammick Entertainment at GameSpy - View Gammick Entertainment profile, all the games created and published by Gammick Entertainment plus news about their latest games.
data.text: Based in Barcelona, Spain, Gammick aims to oversee and nurture the productions of international video game development companies. The initiative responds to the needs, both financial and organisational, of the growing Spanish video game sector. Gammick focuses on video game production for PCs, new generation consoles and portables. Gammick was founded in in April 2007.
